duties_responsibilities.duty: Transform client maturity, improve control environments, create new client offerings, and lead engagements.
Influence, shape, and grow the Security Advisory practice, working with the North America Security Advisory Lead.
Drive multi-million sales, revenues, and consultative selling initiatives.
Understand clients' security needs, solve unique problems, and shape commercial models, risk, and go-to-market across security capabilities.
Drive industry-aligned focus, enhancing maturity, defining strategy, solving technology issues, and optimizing business processes.
Grow and nurture internal talent, passing on knowledge and experience to create the leaders of the future.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Cyber Security, Information Technology, or related field (Master's preferred)
